5#ifndef V8_HEAP_YOUNG_GENERATION_MARKING_VISITOR_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_YOUNG_GENERATION_MARKING_VISITOR_H_
7
8#include <type_traits>
9
10#include "src/heap/ephemeron-remembered-set.h"
11#include "src/heap/heap.h"
12#include "src/heap/marking-worklist.h"
13#include "src/heap/objects-visiting.h"
14#include "src/heap/pretenuring-handler.h"
15
16namespace v8 {
17namespace internal {
18
19enum class YoungGenerationMarkingVisitationMode { kParallel, kConcurrent };
20
21template <YoungGenerationMarkingVisitationMode marking_mode>
22class YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor final
23 : public NewSpaceVisitor<YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor<marking_mode>> {
24 public:
25 enum class ObjectVisitationMode {
26 kVisitDirectly,
27 kPushToWorklist,
28 };
29
30 enum class SlotTreatmentMode {
31 kReadOnly,
32 kReadWrite,
33 };
34
35 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor(
36 Heap* heap,
37 PretenuringHandler::PretenuringFeedbackMap* local_pretenuring_feedback);
38
39 ~YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor() override;
40
41 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor(const YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor&) = delete;
42 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor& operator=(
43 const YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor&) = delete;
44
45 static constexpr bool EnableConcurrentVisitation() {
46 return marking_mode == YoungGenerationMarkingVisitationMode::kConcurrent;
47 }
48
49 V8_INLINE void VisitPointers(Tagged<HeapObject> host, ObjectSlot start,
50 ObjectSlot end) final {
51 VisitPointersImpl(host, start, end);
52 }
53 V8_INLINE void VisitPointers(Tagged<HeapObject> host, MaybeObjectSlot start,
54 MaybeObjectSlot end) final {
55 VisitPointersImpl(host, start, end);
56 }
57 V8_INLINE void VisitPointer(Tagged<HeapObject> host, ObjectSlot p) final {
58 VisitPointersImpl(host, p, p + 1);
59 }
60 V8_INLINE void VisitPointer(Tagged<HeapObject> host,
61 MaybeObjectSlot p) final {
62 VisitPointersImpl(host, p, p + 1);
63 }
64
65 // Visitation specializations used for unified heap young gen marking.
66 V8_INLINE int VisitJSApiObject(Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<JSObject> object);
67 V8_INLINE int VisitJSArrayBuffer(Tagged<Map> map,
68 Tagged<JSArrayBuffer> object);
69 V8_INLINE int VisitJSDataViewOrRabGsabDataView(
70 Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<JSDataViewOrRabGsabDataView> object);
71 V8_INLINE int VisitJSTypedArray(Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<JSTypedArray> object);
72
73 // Visitation specializations used for collecting pretenuring feedback.
74 V8_INLINE int VisitJSObject(Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<JSObject> object);
75 V8_INLINE int VisitJSObjectFast(Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<JSObject> object);
76 template <typename T, typename TBodyDescriptor = typename T::BodyDescriptor>
77 V8_INLINE int VisitJSObjectSubclass(Tagged<Map> map, Tagged<T> object);
78
79 V8_INLINE int VisitEphemeronHashTable(Tagged<Map> map,
80 Tagged<EphemeronHashTable> table);
81
82#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
83 V8_INLINE void VisitExternalPointer(Tagged<HeapObject> host,
84 ExternalPointerSlot slot) final;
85#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
86
87 template <ObjectVisitationMode visitation_mode,
88 SlotTreatmentMode slot_treatment_mode, typename TSlot>
89 V8_INLINE bool VisitObjectViaSlot(TSlot slot);
90
91 template <typename TSlot>
92 V8_INLINE bool VisitObjectViaSlotInRememberedSet(TSlot slot);
93
94 MarkingWorklists::Local& marking_worklists_local() {
95 return marking_worklists_local_;
96 }
97
98 V8_INLINE void IncrementLiveBytesCached(MutablePageMetadata* chunk,
99 intptr_t by);
100
101 void PublishWorklists() {
102 marking_worklists_local_.Publish();
103 ephemeron_table_list_local_.Publish();
104 }
105
106 private:
107 using Parent = NewSpaceVisitor<YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor<marking_mode>>;
108
109 bool TryMark(Tagged<HeapObject> obj) {
110 return MarkBit::From(obj).Set<AccessMode::ATOMIC>();
111 }
112
113 template <typename TSlot>
114 V8_INLINE void VisitPointersImpl(Tagged<HeapObject> host, TSlot start,
115 TSlot end);
116
117#ifdef V8_MINORMS_STRING_SHORTCUTTING
118 V8_INLINE bool ShortCutStrings(HeapObjectSlot slot,
119 Tagged<HeapObject>* heap_object);
120#endif // V8_MINORMS_STRING_SHORTCUTTING
121
122 template <typename T, typename TBodyDescriptor = typename T::BodyDescriptor>
123 int VisitEmbedderTracingSubClassWithEmbedderTracing(Tagged<Map> map,
124 Tagged<T> object);
125
126 static constexpr size_t kNumEntries = 128;
127 static constexpr size_t kEntriesMask = kNumEntries - 1;
128 // Fixed-size hashmap that caches live bytes. Hashmap entries are evicted to
129 // the global counters on collision.
130 std::array<std::pair<MutablePageMetadata*, size_t>, kNumEntries>
131 live_bytes_data_;
132
133 Isolate* const isolate_;
134 MarkingWorklists::Local marking_worklists_local_;
135 EphemeronRememberedSet::TableList::Local ephemeron_table_list_local_;
136 PretenuringHandler* const pretenuring_handler_;
137 PretenuringHandler::PretenuringFeedbackMap* const local_pretenuring_feedback_;
138 const bool shortcut_strings_;
139};
140
141} // namespace internal
142} // namespace v8
143
144#endif // V8_HEAP_YOUNG_GENERATION_MARKING_VISITOR_H_
